mapper.select: SELECT NO, MASTERINFO, MASTERID, ADMININFO, ADMINID, REGDATE, HIT, TITLE FROM MASTERASKADMIN

SELECT RM, NO, MASTERINFO, MASTERID, ADMININFO, ADMINID, REGDATE, HIT, TITLE FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY NO DESC) RM, NO, MASTERINFO, MASTERID, ADMININFO, ADMINID, REGDATE, HIT, TITLE FROM MASTERASKADMIN) WHERE RM BETWEEN #{start} AND #{end} ORDER BY NO
